def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity
registro = widget.Entity if registro == None: return
somenteLeitura = registro.SomenteLeitura() if (somenteLeitura): widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
